forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 61F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 14C. S winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 58F. S winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 59F. Winds S at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 16C. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 48F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 18C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 65F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low around 10C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low near 50F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High around 20C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 69F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 52F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
